verses.text: E masanil ex cajan ex t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik, b'itananhec d'ha Dios t'a tzalajk'olal.
B'itejec sb'inajnaquil. B'itananhec t'ay yet' juntzanh b'it manhxo jantacoc swach'il.
Alec d'ha Dios icha tik: Mamin a tas tza b'o'o, te satub'tac. Ha wal t'a ichanh stelwican heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayach, yujto te niwan a poder.
Masanil heb' anima t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik syak'em sb'a t'ayach, tzach sb'itan heb', xe chi t'ay.
Cotanhec, ilec wal tas sb'onac Dios. Satub'tac tas sk'ulej yuj ko wach'iloc a onh anima onh tik.
Taquinh lu'um ajnac ha' mar yet' ha' niwac ha' yuj, haxo ta' ek'naccot heb' ko mam quicham. Tzalajocab' ko k'ool d'ha Dios.
Ha yet' spoder syak' yajalil t'a masanil tiempo. Aynhejoch sat t'a junjun nación, yic wach' max och heb' syik'chaanh sb'a ajk'olal t'ay.
Ex junjun nación, alec wach' lolonel t'a ko Diosal. Ab'chajocab' he b'itan t'ay t'a wach' lolonelal.
Yujto ha' tz'ak'an ko k 'inal, max onh schalaj telwoc.
Ach Dios, tik wal ix il ko pensar. Icha wal sacb'itaj k'een plata, icha wal chi' ix aj onh a sacb'itani.
Ix onh ak'kan t'a te' yaal. Yelxo wal te al icatz ix ak' ko cuchu'.
Ha heb' comon anima ix ak'lab'ej onh stek'ani. Ix onh ak' ek' t'a skal te' k'ak' yet' t'a yol ha' niwac ha'. Ixlajwi chi' ix onh ik'anb'at b'aj junk'olal tzonh aji.
Ol in och t'a yol a templo yuj wak'an in silab' t'ayach. Ichato wal chi' ol wak'anelk'och in ti' wak'nac t'ayach,
aton tas walnac ayic ay in och t'a ilk'olal.
Ha nok' nok' b'ak'uech ol in nhustz'ha t'a altar. Ol wak' nok' wacax, nok' mam chiwa yet' pax nok' ch'ac calnel in silab'oc t'ayach, aton tik scha a k'ool.
Cotanhec he masanil, mach ex ay yelk'och Dios t'a he sat. Maclejec eyab' t'ayin, ol wal t'ayex jantac swach'k'olal t'ayin.
Ix in k'an scolwal wed'oc, ix walan wach' lolonel t'ay.
Q'uinaloc tato a chukal ix in nib'ej in k'ulej, maj am schalaj yab' Dios Yajal t'a Smasanil tas ix in k'an t'ay.
Palta ix yab'i tas ix in k'an chi' t'ay, ix sk'anab'ajej in lesal.
Alchajocab' wach' lolonel d'ha Dios, yujto max spatiquejel in lesal, manh puraloclaj ix yak' swach'k'olal t'ayin.
